review: so many free apps ... able to watch most anything i want.  i have a few subscriptions to channels but still beats cable/satellite pricing by over $70 per month.
author: Evelyn Seiler

review: This device is amazing, I use it where ever I have wifi including when traveling in my RV.
author: Kirk Lund

review: I have this and the Apple TV. Both have their advantages. This has a few more channel options.
author: Tricia Johnston

review: Found and connected to U-Verse WIFI, but wouldn't stream with itReturned and replaced with ROKU which worked perfectly.
author: critic

review: NOT THE BEST WITH CONNECTIVITY, MY GOOGLE CHROMCAST WORKS MUCH BETTER. MY SHOWS ARE CONSTANTLY STOPPING AND BUFFERING AND I HAVE GREAT INTERNET AND IT ONLY HAPPENS WITH THE FIRE TV NOT W CHROMECAST OR STREAMING VIA INTERNET
author: NoRo

review: Love it.  Easy set up.  Item as described.  Timely shipment. Great packaging.
author: Laura A. Bonner

review: Very nice product, it is faster than google chromecast as reviews say, there are two aspects that are lacking, first the stick mostly needs to be connected to a power outlet instead of the usb port from tv on most cases, and second, a big downside is that if you're planning to use it outside US, there aren't many viewing choices due to region restrictions, this issue should be display in advance so no one feels dissapointed, otherwise this is a great product.
author: Rudolph Glen

review: I was getting so agitated with the long process of loading and hang-ups from Chromecast that I didn't want to use it.  I ordered the Fire Stick and was shocked at its speed.  Goodbye Chromecast, you slow poke and jammer!
author: Beverly Gunter
